name: STORQ3000
description:
In STORQ3000 you are put in a role of spaceship commander, storming through enemy territory on a distant planet to fulfill your mission.  The goal is simple: cause as much damage as possible and try to survive the longest you can. Every (10) second matters. Maneuver around local terrain and dodge enemy rockets, lasers and other gunfire. Beware of the heat, as the dense planet's atmosphere raises your ship's temperature through the roof. Escape to exosphere to cool down, but try not to freeze to death.

--- /// /// /// ---

tldr; Dodge stuff. Every 10s you heat up/freeze. Press shift to change height and not die from temperature. Every 10s your score increases.

Controls:

- movement: Arrow keys

- shoot: Space

- jump between atmosphere/exosphere: Shift

--- /// /// /// ---

The game was made in 72h by CLOWNWORKS as a Ludum Dare 51 submission.

It was our first attempt at making a 3D space shooter so some things are far from perfection, but we're really proud of the end result!
